attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2013-0791

Date: 2013-06-06

Sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que l’honorable John K. Mitchell, juge de la Cour suprême de l’Île-du-Prince-Édouard, soit nommé juge de la Cour d'appel de l'Île-du-Prince-Édouard, et juge d'office de la Cour suprême de l’Île-du-Prince-Édouard, à compter du 1er septembre 2013.


The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advises that the Honourable John K. Mitchell, a Judge of the Supreme Court of Prince Edward Island, be appointed a Judge of the Prince Edward Island Court of Appeal, and a Judge ex officio of the Supreme Court of Prince Edward Island, effective September 1, 2013.

The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advises that the Honourable John K. Mitchell, a Judge of the Supreme Court of Prince Edward Island, be appointed a Judge of the Prince Edward Island Court of Appeal, and a Judge ex officio of the Supreme Court of Prince Edward Island, effective September 1, 2013.
